release.description: This release of the PDS4 Tools software is a component of the integrated release 4.1.0 of the PDS4 System. This is an operational release of the system components to date.
This release of the PDS4 Tools software is a component of the integrated releases 3.1.1 and 4.0.0 of the PDS4 System. This is an operational release of the system components to date.
release.action: Second release of the software that supports reading and transformation of PDS4 table and image data. This version supports v1.0.0.0 of the data model.

release.description: This release of the PDS4 Tools software is a component of the integrated release 3.0.0 of the PDS4 System. This is an operational release of the system components to date.
release.action: Initial release of the software that supports reading and transformation of PDS4 table and image data. This version supports v0.3.0.0.a of the data model.
